translation: Mentally renouncing all actions in Me, having Me as the highest goal, and resorting to the yoga of discrimination, do thou ever fix thy mind on Me.
commentary: 18.57 Chetsa mentally? all actions all actions? Mayi in Me? Sannyasya resigning? Devoted to Me having Me as the highest goal? Buddhiyogam the Yoga of discrimination? resorting to resorting to? Macchittah with the mind fixed on Me? Constantly always? Be be.Commentary Do thou? Or Arjuna? surrender all thy actions to Me whilst at the same time fixing thy mind on discrimination. Then through that discrimination thou wilt
